directions: Spread 2 Tbsp. peanut butter on each tortilla.
On each tortilla, place 1/2 sliced banana on top of peanut butter. Then, top each with 1/2 cup of strawberries, pineapple and coconut.
Place Edible Disney(R) Decals on Tortillas and enjoy (instructions on back of Mission Kid Size Tortilla package).
ingredients: 2 Mission® Kid Size Flour Tortillas with Edible Disney® Tortilla Decals
1 cup strawberries, hulled (cut off the green parts), sliced
1/2 (15 ounce) can crushed pineapple, well drained
title: Magical Peanut Butter Tacos
